patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@
+html.lenis
+  height auto
+
+.lenis.lenis-smooth
+  scroll-behavior auto
+
+.lenis.lenis-smooth [data-lenis-prevent]
+  overscroll-behavior contain
+
+.lenis.lenis-stopped
+  overflow hidden
+
+.lenis.lenis-scrolling iframe
+  pointer-events none
+
+.splide.is-initialized:not(.is-active) .splide__list
+  display flex !important
+  gap 2rem
+
+.testimonials__slider .splide__track
+  overflow visible
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+html.lenis

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,81 @@
+html.lenis
+  height auto
+
+.lenis.lenis-smooth
+  scroll-behavior auto
+
+.lenis.lenis-smooth [data-lenis-prevent]
+  overscroll-behavior contain
+
+.lenis.lenis-stopped
+  overflow hidden
+
+.lenis.lenis-scrolling iframe
+  pointer-events none
+
+.splide.is-initialized:not(.is-active) .splide__list
+  display flex !important
+  gap 2rem
+
+.arrow
+  user-select none
+
+.testimonials__slider, .presence__slider, .bump__slider, .study-gallery__slider
+  .splide__track
+    overflow visible
+
+// filters
+.filter-check__item:not(.filter-check__item--all)
+  box-shadow 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
+
+.filter-check__item
+  padding 0
+  margin 0
+  overflow hidden
+  user-select none
+
+.filter-check__item input
+  display none
+
+.filter-check__item span
+  padding 1em 1.5em
+  width 100% !important
+  height 100%
+  display block !important
+  font-weight 600 !important
+
+.filter-check__item input:checked + span
+  background var(--primary-color)
+  color #000
+
+/* ------------------------------ */
+.filter-select__select
+  // padding-left 0.5rem
+
+@media screen and (min-width 992px)
+  .filter-select__select
+    height 3rem !important
+    border none
+    overflow hidden
+    padding 0
+
+  .filter-select__select >option
+    font-weight 600
+    padding 0 20px
+    align-items center
+    display inline-flex
+    cursor pointer
+    height 100%
+
+  .filter-select__select >option:not(:first-child)
+    box-shadow 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
+
+  .filter-select__select >option:checked
+    background #b2bf4a linear-gradient(0deg, #b2bf4a 0%, #b2bf4a 100%)
+    color -internal-inactive-list-box-selection-text !important
+
+  .filter-select__select >option:checked::-moz-focus-inner
+    border 0
+
+  .filter-select__select >option:checked:focus
+    outline none

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
html.lenis
  height auto

.lenis.lenis-smooth
  scroll-behavior auto

.lenis.lenis-smooth [data-lenis-prevent]
  overscroll-behavior contain

.lenis.lenis-stopped
  overflow hidden

.lenis.lenis-scrolling iframe
  pointer-events none

.splide.is-initialized:not(.is-active) .splide__list
  display flex !important
  gap 2rem
